subsection.name: Stable
subsection.p: The current stable version is 1.1 and is available via Maven, Ivy or direct download.

subsection.name: SNAPSHOT
subsection.p: Snapshot versions are subject to change without notice. The version of this documentation refers to is indicated in the top right and may differ to previous stable releases. Although we'll try not to alter the API significantly, any changes to the API are documented in the change report. You can always checkout directly from Subversion if your millage varies.

section.name: Download Instructions
section.p: The project is published via the OSS Sonatype Maven repository. This should be synced with the Maven Central repository.

You can download the source and binary jar directly from
https://oss.sonatype.org/content/groups/public/com/google/code/tempus-fugit or use Maven or Ivy.
